item.title: 流行的 3D 打印枪将第二修正案全球化
item.description:
FGC-9由一名德国乱伦者设计，秉承了鲜明的美国精神。【原文：

Designed by a German incel, the FGC-9 was created in a distinctly American spirit.

】

item.title: 尽管资金缺口 "巨大"，巴比什仍誓言保持捷克的赤字目标
item.description: 捷克亿万富翁安德烈-巴比斯（Andrej Babis）所在的ANO党在本月大选中占据主导地位，他表示，新政府将坚持上届政府制定的明年预算赤字目标，但由于资金存在 "巨大缺口"，他发誓将重新制定计划。【原文：Czech billionaire Andrej Babis, whose ANO party dominated this month’s general election, said the new government will stick to the previous administration’s budget deficit target for next year, though he vowed to rework plans due to a “huge hole” in funding.】

item.title: 欧洲央行目标 2029 年推出数字欧元，准备工作仍在继续
item.description: 目前的准备阶段本月结束后，欧洲中央银行将继续为数字欧元奠定基础，预计四年后推出数字欧元。【原文：The European Central Bank will continue laying the groundwork for the digital euro after the current preparation phase ends this month, penciling in a launch in four years’ time.】

item.title: 全球风险加剧，澳大利亚财长向投资者发出警报
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查默斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，由于世界经济能否抵御日益加剧的不利因素或将陷入调整的不确定性增加，全球投资者都处于紧张状态，资本流动 "惶惶不安"。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers said global investors are on edge and capital flows are “jumpy” as uncertainty builds over whether the world economy can withstand mounting headwinds or will slip into a correction.】

item.title: 电力需求疲软，印度煤炭巨头利润下滑
item.description: 印度国营矿业巨头印度煤炭有限公司（Coal India Ltd.）报告称，由于今年电力需求疲软，影响了燃料的价格和运输，该公司第二季度利润同比下降了 31%。【原文：State mining giant Coal India Ltd. reported a 31% decline from a year earlier in second-quarter profit, following this year’s weak demand for electricity that weighed on prices and shipments of the fuel.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行（英国）因汽车贷款赔偿问题的不确定性而暂缓发布财报
item.description: 英国桑坦德银行（Santander UK）决定不公布预定的第三季度财报，因为该公司正在等待英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）提出的赔偿计划的明朗化，该计划针对的是被英国最大的几家汽车贷款公司误卖汽车贷款的客户。【原文：Santander UK decided not to publish its scheduled third-quarter results as it waits for clarity on a compensation plan proposed by the Financial Conduct Authority for customers who were missold car loans by some of the country’s biggest auto lenders.】

item.title: 国内需求抵消贸易影响，西班牙经济增长保持强劲
item.description: 西班牙继续保持强劲增长，巩固了其作为欧元区头号主要经济体的地位。【原文：Spain continued to record strong growth, cementing its status as the euro area’s top major economy.】

item.title: 原油暴跌，石油巨头与欧佩克携手增产
item.description: 尽管原油价格疲软，欧佩克（OPEC）及其盟国的供应量增加，但预计全球最大的石油公司将在本周公布财报时继续推进加快增产的计划。【原文：The world’s biggest oil companies are expected to press ahead with plans to accelerate production growth when they report earnings this week, despite weak crude prices and higher supplies from OPEC and its allies.】

item.title: 交易商关注脆弱的供应平衡，欧洲天然气走高
item.description: 欧洲天然气期货走高，交易商正在权衡供应充足的风险和天气变冷可能导致需求增加的风险。【原文：European natural gas futures edged higher, with traders weighing risks to ample supplies and the likelihood that colder weather will drive up demand.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚称美国告诉盟国将削减在东欧的驻军
item.description: 罗马尼亚国防部周三表示，美国已通知其盟国，决定减少在北约东翼的驻军。【原文：The US has informed its allies that it decided to reduce its troop presence on NATO’s eastern flank, Romania’s defense ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Glencore 称有望实现 2025 年生产目标
item.description: Glencore Plc 表示，该公司有望实现全年生产目标，因为该公司正试图证明其正在克服运营挫折的名声。【原文：Glencore Plc said it’s on track to hit full-year production targets as the company tries to demonstrate that it’s overcoming a reputation for operational setbacks.】

item.title: 购物者无视英国经济困境，Next 再次上调指导价
item.description: 英国时装和家居用品零售商 Next Plc 今年第四次上调了利润指导，因为该公司第三季度的销售情况好于预期。【原文：Next Plc raised its profit guidance for the fourth time this year after sales at the British fashion and homewares retailer held up better than expected in the third quarter.】

item.title: 小松业绩下滑，营业利润降至三年来最低点
item.description: 受日元走强、出货量下降以及主营建筑、采矿和公用事业设备业务成本上升的拖累，小松制作所公布了自 2022 年以来最低的营业利润，股价在收盘前下跌。【原文：Komatsu Ltd. shares fell before the close after posting its lowest operating profit since 2022, dragged down by a stronger yen, lower shipment volumes and rising costs in its mainstay construction, mining and utility equipment business.】

item.title: 印度石油公司与维多公司将于 2026 年成立贸易合资企业
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士透露，印度石油公司计划明年初在新加坡与大宗商品贸易商维多公司（Vitol Inc.【原文：Indian Oil Corp. plans to start a joint venture with commodities trader Vitol Inc. in Singapore to trade oil and fuel products early next year, a person familiar with the development said.】

item.title: 投资者等待日本央行信号，日元期权成交量创一个月新低
item.description: 由于投资者在等待日本央行周四的政策决定，以寻找美元兑日元走向的线索，美元兑日元期权成交量降至涓涓细流，创下一个月以来的新低。【原文：Dollar-yen option volumes are down to a trickle, hitting a one-month low as investors await the Bank of Japan’s policy decision on Thursday for clues on the pair’s direction.】

item.title: 日经指数反弹乏力，只有少数股票上涨
item.description: 日本蓝筹股指数今天大涨 2.2%，创下新纪录，但只有少数几个股票大涨，这表明涨势的广度很窄，可能使其容易受到潜在调整的影响。【原文：Japan’s blue-chip stock gauge jumped 2.2% to mark a fresh record today, but only a handful of names did the heavy lifting, a sign that the rally’s narrow breadth could leave it vulnerable to a potential correction.】

item.title: NEC 将以 29 亿美元收购美国电信服务提供商 CSG
item.description: 日本 NEC 公司表示，将以约 29 亿美元的价格收购美国有线电视和电话公司客户服务和计费服务供应商 CSG 系统国际公司，以加强其在美国的业务。【原文：Japan’s NEC Corp. said it’s buying CSG Systems International Inc., a US supplier of customer care and billing services for cable and phone companies, for around $2.9 billion in a move to shore up its operations in the US.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索反弹，央行否认关注汇率水平
item.description: 菲律宾比索从历史低点反弹，因为市场参与者评估了中央银行对弱势货币的容忍度。【原文：The Philippine peso rebounded from a record low as market participants assess the central bank’s tolerance for a weaker currency.】

item.title: 中美有望达成共识，供应受挫，铜价涨至创纪录水平
item.description: 随着中美两国即将达成一项全面协议以缓和贸易紧张局势，铜价创下历史新高，而矿山的一系列供应挫折则使全球市场趋紧。【原文：Copper rallied to a record, with the US and China on the cusp of a sweeping deal to dial down trade tensions, while a series of supply setbacks at mines have tightened the global market.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股票期货稳定，英镑下跌
人工智能盈利优势扩大至更多股票，消除泡沫担忧
item.description: 人工智能公司的盈利前景一片光明，这消除了人们对人工智能引领的全球股市在创下历史纪录后陷入泡沫的担忧。【原文：A brighter earnings outlook for artificial-intelligence companies is allaying concerns that the AI-led global equity rally is in a bubble territory after hitting records.】

item.title: 印度中央银行加快海外黄金回流速度
item.description: 印度央行目前在国内持有超过 65% 的黄金储备，比四年前增加了近一倍，在西方国家入侵乌克兰后冻结了俄罗斯的黄金储备之后，印度加快了贵金属的回流。【原文：India’s central bank now holds more than 65% of its gold reserves at home, nearly double the share from four years ago, accelerating the repatriation of the precious metal after Western nations froze Russia’s reserves following the invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 运载俄罗斯原油的印度籍油轮在波罗的海掉头
item.description: 一艘满载俄罗斯原油、驶往印度的油轮调转航向，目前在波罗的海闲置，这表明在美国加强对莫斯科的制裁后，两国之间的石油贸易可能会中断。【原文：An India-bound tanker filled with Russian crude reversed course and is now idling in the Baltic Sea, a sign of potential disruption in oil trade between the two countries after the US tightened sanctions on Moscow.】

item.title: 特朗普燃起中国黑井销售希望，英伟达股价飙升
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将与中国领导人习近平讨论芯片制造商 Blackwell 人工智能处理器之后，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s shares extended their dramatic ascent to a record after US President Donald Trump said he’ll discuss the chipmaker’s Blackwell artificial intelligence processors with Chinese leader Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 监管机构要求降低收费，印度资产管理公司股价下滑
item.description: 市场监管机构提出了针对该行业的规则，包括对共同基金和经纪人收取的某些费用设定上限，此后印度资金管理公司和股票经纪公司的股票在周三暴跌。【原文：Shares of Indian money managers and stock-broking firms tumbled on Wednesday after the market regulator proposed rules for the sector, including caps on some fees charged by mutual funds and brokers.】

item.title: 国内收益率飙升，日本保险公司削减外债
item.description: 国内收益率的上升促使日本一些最大的人寿保险公司增加国内债券持有量，减少海外债务，因为海外收益不再像以前那样可观。【原文：Rising yields at home are prompting some of Japan’s biggest life insurers to boost domestic bond holdings and pare overseas debt, with foreign returns no longer stacking up as they once did.】

item.title: 中国购买本季首批美国大豆
item.description: 中国已经购买了至少两船美国大豆，这是其本季首次购买大豆，这可能标志着作为本周两个最大经济体之间有望达成的更广泛协议的一部分，美国大豆的流动正在恢复。【原文：China has bought at least two cargoes of US soybeans, its first known purchase this season, which may mark a revival of flows as part of a wider settlement expected to be agreed between the two biggest economies this week.】

item.title: 贾戈银行利润飙升，主要得益于利息收入和用户增长
item.description: 印尼数字贷款公司 PT Bank Jago 今年前九个月的利润增长了一倍多，主要原因是应用程序的使用率不断提高，导致利息收入激增。【原文：PT Bank Jago, an Indonesian digital lender, more than doubled profit in the first nine months of the year, driven by a surge in interest income amid growing app usage.】

item.title: 中国混合动力车和电动车销量大增，刷新欧洲汽车销量纪录
item.description: 由于对电池驱动和混合动力电动车型的需求激增，中国汽车制造商 9 月份在欧洲的业绩创下了有史以来最好的一个月，一举超过了此前的最高点。【原文：Chinese carmakers posted their best month ever in Europe, roaring past previous highs in September on surging demand for battery-powered and hybrid-electric models.】

item.title: 荷兰大选将权衡回归中庸之道
item.description: 在近代史上最右翼的政府领导下经历了两年的政治动荡之后，荷兰选民将于周三前往投票站，决定他们是否要开辟一条新的道路。【原文：After two years of political turmoil under the most right-wing administration in recent history, Dutch voters will head to the polls Wednesday to decide if they’ll chart a new path.】
